title: Aragorn, Defender of Free Peoples (6R50)
text:
Set:	Ents of Fangorn
Kind:	Free People
Culture:	Gondor
Twilight:	4
Card Type:	Companion • Man
Strength:	8
Vitality:	4
Resistance:	6
Signet:	Theoden
Game Text:	Skirmish: Remove an [Elven] token to make a minion skirmishing Aragorn strength -3. Skirmish: Remove a [Dwarven] token to heal a Dwarf. Regroup: If Aragorn is mounted, remove a [Rohan] token to wound a minion twice.
Lore:	”'…this is the hour when we draw swords together.'”
Rarity:	R
